result.html: Tá an namhaid seo dochloíteThis enemy is undefeatable.
result.ponchtml: Tá an naṁaid seo doċloíteThis enemy is undefeatable.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde

result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: He hated school and books with a passion.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra

result.ponchtml: Ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leaḃraHe hated school and books with a passion.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
